languages.text: Приказом Лорд-капитана сервиторы были возвращены на те палубы, где работали прежде. Первое время члены экипажа были напуганы этим, но вскоре быстро адаптировались к особенностям сервиторов, кроме того, после описанного инцидента странности в их поведении случались значительно реже.

traits.locale_text: Приказом Лорд-капитана сервиторы были возвращены на те палубы, где работали прежде. Первое время члены экипажа были напуганы этим, но вскоре быстро адаптировались к особенностям сервиторов, кроме того, после описанного инцидента странности в их поведении случались значительно реже.

languages.text: On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable reduction in the servitors' strange behaviour.
languages.original_text: Приказом Лорд-капитана сервиторы были возвращены на те палубы, где работали прежде. Первое время члены экипажа были напуганы этим, но вскоре быстро адаптировались к особенностям сервиторов, кроме того, после описанного инцидента странности в их поведении случались значительно реже.

traits.locale_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable decline in the servitors' strange behaviour.

On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable decline in the servitors' strange behaviour.

On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable reduction in the servitors' strange behaviour.

On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable reduction in the servitors' strange behaviour.

On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable reduction in the servitors' strange behaviour.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの命令に従い、サーヴィターたちは以前働いていたデッキに戻された。乗組員たちは最初は彼らの存在に怖気づいていたが、すぐにその奇妙な振る舞いに適応した。特に問題の出来事以降、サーヴィターたちの奇妙な振る舞いが明らかに減少したため、乗組員たちは彼らの癖に慣れることができたのであった。
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable reduction in the servitors' strange behaviour.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの命令に従い、サーヴィターたちは以前働いていたデッキに戻された。乗組員たちは最初は彼らの存在に怖気づいていたが、すぐにその奇妙な振る舞いに適応した。特に問題の出来事以降、サーヴィターたちの奇妙な振る舞いが明らかに減少したため、乗組員たちは彼らの癖に慣れることができたのであった。

languages.text: Sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les servitors furent renvoyés aux ponts sur lesquels ils travaillaient habituellement. D'abord troublé par leur présence, l'équipage s'adapta vite à leurs manies, d'autant qu'à la suite de l'incident en question, le comportement des servitors se fit beaucoup moins étrange.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable reduction in the servitors' strange behaviour.

traits.locale_text: Sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les servitors furent renvoyés aux ponts sur lesquels ils travaillaient habituellement. D'abord troublé par leur présence, l'équipage s'adapta vite à leurs manies, d'autant qu'à la suite de l'incident en question, le comportement des servitors se fit beaucoup moins étrange.

languages.text: 在舰长大人的命令之下，这些机仆被送回了原来的工作岗位。船员一开始感到非常不安，但他们很快就适应了这些机仆的怪癖。这场事件结束之后，那些机仆的怪异行为明显变少了。
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable reduction in the servitors' strange behaviour.

traits.locale_text: 在舰长大人的命令之下，这些奴工被送回了原来的工作岗位。船员一开始感到非常不安，但他们很快就适应了这些奴工的怪癖。这场事件结束之后，那些奴工的怪异行为明显变少了。

languages.text: Por orden de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, los servidores volvieron a las mismas cubiertas en las que habían trabajado hasta ese momento. Al principio, su presencia inquietó a la tripulación, pero los trabajadores no tardaron en adaptarse a sus peculiaridades, especialmente porque, después del incidente en cuestión, su extraño comportamiento se redujo notablemente.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable reduction in the servitors' strange behaviour.

traits.locale_text: Por orden de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, los servidores volvieron a las mismas cubiertas en las que habían trabajado hasta ese momento. Al principio, su presencia inquietó a la tripulación, pero los trabajadores no tardaron en adaptarse a sus peculiaridades, especialmente porque, después del incidente en cuestión, su extraño comportamiento se redujo notablemente.

languages.text: Auf Befehl des Lord Captains wurden die Servitoren auf Decks zurückgebracht, auf denen sie bisher gearbeitet hatten. Anfangs machte ihre Anwesenheit die Crew nervös, doch bald gewöhnten sich alle an ihre Eigenheiten. Auch, weil sich die Servitoren nach dem fraglichen Vorfall immer seltener merkwürdig benahmen.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable reduction in the servitors' strange behaviour.

traits.locale_text: Auf Befehl des Lord Captains wurden die Servitoren auf Decks zurückgebracht, auf denen sie bisher gearbeitet hatten. Anfangs machte ihre Anwesenheit die Crew nervös, doch bald gewöhnten sich alle an ihre Eigenheiten. Auch, weil sich die Servitoren nach dem fraglichen Vorfall immer seltener merkwürdig benahmen.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın emri üzerine hizmetörler, daha evvel çalıştıkları yerlere geri gönderildi. Mürettebat başta rahatsız olsa da tuhaflıklara çabucak alıştı. Tabii mevzubahis hadisenin ardından hizmetörlerin olağan dışı davranışlarında dikkate değer bir azalma görülmesi de bu durumda etkili oldu.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, the servitors were returned to the same decks where they had worked before. The crew was initially unnerved by their presence but adapted to their quirks soon enough, especially since, following the incident in question, there was a noticeable reduction in the servitors' strange behaviour.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın emri üzerine hizmetörler daha evvel çalıştıkları yerlere geri gönderildi. Mürettebat başta rahatsız olsa da tuhaflıklara çabucak alıştı. Tabii mevzubahis hadisenin ardından hizmetörlerin olağan dışı davranışlarında dikkate değer bir azalma görülmesi bu durumda etkili oldu.
